hadiths.text: Narrated `Umar bin Abi Salama:I saw the Prophet (ﷺ) offering prayers in a single garment in the house of Um-Salama and he had crossed its ends around his shoulders

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي الثَّوْبِ الْوَاحِدِ مُلْتَحِفًا بِهِ
chapter.eng-name: To offer As-Salat (the prayers) with a single garment wrapped round the body
